articles.title: EncroChat dealer 'Vilecrusher' who cut 'import-quality' cocaine found with £26k worth of drugs
articles.description: Around £64,000 worth of designer goods were also found at his home
articles.content:
A drug wholesaler told police officers “anyone who’s had those Encros is f***ing going” as they raided his home and uncovered a secret room that was used to prepare cocaine and heroin.

articles.title: Men charged over alleged cocaine importation concealed in parcels
articles.description: Two Sydney men have been charged over the alleged importation of more than $1 million of cocaine concealed in airfreight parcels.
articles.content:
Buying drugs on the dark web is not as harmless as you think, these are the high tech ways the ABF is busting would-be buyers and sellers.

articles.title: CA motorcycle club president charged with being 'large scale' cocaine and heroin dealer
articles.description: More than a dozen people were charged with selling cocaine powder, heroin, and crack in three federal cases unsealed last week.
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO — The president of a Sacramento branch of a motorcycle club is a lead defendant in three federal cases accusing him of distributing cocaine, crack and heroin by the kilogram, court records show.

articles.title: Suspect in Garda shooting has lengthy involvement in crime
articles.description: Dubliner involved in gangland crime and served 10 years for cocaine possession
articles.content:
The man being questioned about the shooting of two Garda members during a siege in west Dublin is a convicted drugs dealer who has spent lengthy periods in prison.
The man, a Dubliner in his late 30s, was given a 10-year jail term just over a decade ... [2867 chars]

articles.title: Mobster’s claims turn spotlight to new cocaine route via Turkey
articles.description: A spree of rattling allegations by a Turkish mobster has brought into focus the increase in cocaine trafficking in Turkey and its domestic and international ramifications.
articles.content: Long a major route of heroin smuggling from Afghanistan to Europe, Turkey in recent years has seen an increase in cocaine trafficking as well, leading some to suggest that the country has become a cocaine distribution hub from Latin America to Europe... [8294 chars]

articles.title: Pawtucket Police Work Yields Two Cocaine Indictments
articles.description: Pawtucket Police Work Yields Two Cocaine Indictments - Pawtucket, RI - Men from Conn. and Mass. were indicted by a Providence County Grand Jury and accused of trying to distribute more than a kilo of cocaine.
articles.content:
PROVIDENCE, RI — Two men from Connecticut and Massachusetts have been indicted by a Providence County Grand July following drug investigations by the Pawtucket Police Department.

articles.title: Cop Mistakenly Inhales 'Cloud' of Cocaine After Suspect Arrest
articles.description: Officers first feared their colleague had been exposed to the synthetic opioid Fentanyl, which can be fatal in small doses.
articles.content:
A police officer in Albuquerque, New Mexico, lost consciousness on Monday night after unintentionally inhaling a "cloud" of cocaine that originated from a detained suspect.
